This project is a modern portfolio built with Next.js (App Router), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn UI. Use best practices for component structure, accessibility, and responsive design. Prioritize clean, maintainable code and leverage Tailwind and Shadcn UI for styling and interactivity.
